definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Streaming media is the continuous-flow media which is in the use of transmission Technology.
sentences.chinese: 流媒體就是使用流式傳輸技術的連續時基媒體。

sentences.english: The ATM is an important technology in Broad Integrated Services Degital Network(B ISDN).
sentences.chinese: ATM傳輸技術是寬帶綜合業務數字網的重要技術。

sentences.english: Short-wave transmission technology has been a hot spot in current research.
sentences.chinese: 短波傳輸技術是短波通信的熱點研究課題。

sentences.english: Lattice Orthogonal Frequency Division Multiplexing(LOFDM) is a promising technique for high data-rate transmission in double(namely time-frequency) dispersive channel.
sentences.chinese: 是時頻彌散信道上的一種高速數據傳輸技術。

sentences.english: A promising approach to alleviate the severe impacts of these dynamics is to transmit the media over Multi-Path Transmission.
sentences.chinese: 採用多路徑傳輸技術是有望緩解這一問題的有效途徑。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the main technologies of ultra-long span optical fiber transmission system and the application cases in power system.
sentences.chinese: 超長站距光傳輸技術在電力系統具有廣闊的應用前景。
